title: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings
OB:
1. Open the hyperlink builder by clicking on it.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Close the hyperlink builder.
4. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

OB: The title of the hyperlink builder changes to 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as 'Hyperlink Options' even after reopening it.
SR:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Close the hyperlink builder.
4. Reopen the hyperlink builder to verify the title does not change.
